parameters.text:
=✈️ Welcome to Flight Data Analytics Bot!

Choose your visualization:
1️⃣ Top Airlines (Bar Chart)
2️⃣ Flight Duration Categories (Pie Chart)
3️⃣ Price Distribution (Doughnut Chart)
4️⃣ Price Trends (Line Plot)

additionalFields.caption:
=Vistara soars high with 350+ flights, leading the pack! ✈️

/start again?

=Long-haul dominates with 611 flights, while short-haul adds 279! 🌍

Do you need /start?

=Average prices peak at 14K for 6-8 hour flights! 📈

/start ?

parameters.content:
## 📱 ENTRY POINT
Listens for Telegram messages & button clicks

✅ Triggers on:
- /start command
- Menu button selections
- Chart type selections

💡 TIP: This is where users first interact with the bot!

## 🎯 COMMAND DETECTOR
Smart filter to detect /start command

✅ Purpose:
- Shows welcome menu for new users
- Routes existing interactions to chart generation
- Prevents unnecessary menu displays

⚡ Simple but essential routing logic!

## 🎨 USER INTERFACE
Beautiful welcome menu with chart options

🎯 Features:
- Reply keyboard for easy selection
- Emoji-enhanced buttons
- Clear chart type descriptions
- Resize keyboard for mobile UX

💡 First impression matters - make it count!

## 📊 DATA SOURCE
Reads flight dataset from local storage

📍 File Location: /data/flights.csv
🔧 Encoding: UTF-8
📈 Contains: ~1k (sample) flight records

📋 Expected Columns:
- airline, flight, source_city
- departure_time, arrival_time
- duration, price, class
- destination_city, stops

⚠️ NOTE: Ensure file path exists and is accessible!

## ⚙️ DATA PARSER
Converts CSV into structured JSON objects

🔄 Process:
Raw CSV → Parsed JSON objects
Each row → Individual flight record
Headers → Object properties

✅ Output:
- 1000+ individual items
- Each item = one flight
- Ready for JavaScript processing

🎯 Essential for data manipulation!

## 🎛️ TRAFFIC CONTROLLER
Routes users to correct chart generation


✅ Smart Matching:
- Text-based button detection
- Exact string matching
- Clean output routing

📊 One input → Four possible chart outputs!

## 🎨 CHART GENERATOR (4 Types)

📈 BAR: Top 10 Airlines by flight count
🥧 PIE: Duration categories (Short/Medium/Long)  
🍩 DOUGHNUT: Price ranges (Budget→Luxury)
📊 LINE: Price trends by flight duration

🔧 Process Flow:
Data → Count/Group → Chart.js Config → QuickChart URL → PNG Image

⚡ Features:
- Professional styling with colors
- Auto-generated insights & percentages
- Mobile-optimized 800x600 images
- Custom captions with key findings

💡 Output: Beautiful charts + smart insights in ~3 seconds!
